extendedIngredients.name: feta cheese
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1/2 cup crumbled Organic Valley feta cheese

extendedIngredients.name: pizza dough
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 ball of pizza dough, store-bought or homemade

extendedIngredients.name: pizza sauce
extendedIngredients.originalString: 3/4 cup Local Folks Foods pizza sauce

recipes.title: Spring Pea & Radish Pizza

winePairing.pairingText: Sangiovese, Barbera Wine, and Shiraz are my top picks for Pizza. The best wine for pizza depends on the toppings! Red sauce pizza will call for a red wine with some acidity, such as a barberan or sangiovese. Add pepperoni or sausage and you can go bolder with a syrah. One wine you could try is Hills Vineyard Rosato di Sangiovese. It has 5 out of 5 stars and a bottle costs about 15 dollars.

productMatches.title: Hills Vineyard Rosato di Sangiovese
productMatches.description: Our DRY ros√© wine, made with Sangiovese grapes, is dry, yet fruity, and a perfect wine with our Texas foods, like Bar-B-Q and even hamburgers!! Taste raspberry, strawberry & cherry!

recipes.instructions: Go out and fire up the grill. Grill pizza dough according to Grilled Pizza Tutorial. Alternatively, pizza crust can be baked in oven according to package directions. But, to be honest, in the summer grilling just feels right.  A few minutes before crust is fully cooked, top with pizza sauce, radishes, carrots, shallots, peas, salami and cheese. Cook until toppings are warm and crust is cooked through. Remove from grill. Sprinkle pizza with parsley, if desired. Slice and serve immediately.

steps.step: Go out and fire up the grill. Grill pizza dough according to Grilled Pizza Tutorial. Alternatively, pizza crust can be baked in oven according to package directions. But, to be honest, in the summer grilling just feels right.  A few minutes before crust is fully cooked, top with pizza sauce, radishes, carrots, shallots, peas, salami and cheese. Cook until toppings are warm and crust is cooked through.
Remove from grill. Sprinkle pizza with parsley, if desired. Slice and serve immediately.
